## Class: `snippets_tbl`


### New: `snippets_tbl`

```{r new_snippets_tbl}
new_snippets_tbl <- function(x = tibble::tibble()) {
  
  stopifnot(inherits(x, "tbl_df"))
  if(inherits(x, "snippets_tbl")) return(x) # Already Has Class
  
  class(x) <- c("snippets_tbl", class(x))
  x
}

new_snippets_tbl(tibble(x = 1:2)) %>% class()
```
